column7: Nice food in a nice atmosphere
column9: The menu is very classic with local ingredients and with a touch, for example Sten Broman s whiskey meatballs. The staff friendly

It is very elegant and atmospheric to be at Gambrinus. It is clear that also the price is according to the atmosphere. The room is big, everything is taken care in details and the staff is very professional and give a touch of sophistication.
The...More

Very stylish but yet classical Swedish restaurant in old setting. The menu is simple yet desirable. Prices are fair considering the quality. Service is excellent and I do recommend the whiskey meatballs, at least if you want a Swedish classic. If your not into meat...More

a few restaurants are beyond awesome some days. Today grand hotel in Lund so much delivered an festival in spring flavors. The 4 course dinner was beautiful and so tasty and the composition on micheline star ⭐️  level. Thanks Grand Hotel for giving us this...More

column7: Typical Swedish restaurant in an old setting
column9: We had lunch at Cambrinus. It is a typical Swedish family restaurant with good quality food. We ordered the shrimp sandwich and the meat balls. All was tasty and the portions were not small. The meat balls were very good! Attentive and efficient service, this...More

I was visiting my daughter, who lives in Lund and she wanted to go to Bistro Gambrinus for a dinner. The food and wine was superb and the staff friendly. My daughter ordered their famous huge shrimp sandwich, but I prefer meat, so I took...More

I was surprised that a quality place like this would tolerate such lacklustre service from the wait staff. We had a waiter who was very anxious to move us out of our table near the end of our meal because he had other guests with...More

Come here as often as I can and have done so during past many years. Never disappointed! Food is of high quality and presented without any "fuzz". This time I had the big shrimp sandwich together with a cold Gambrinus beer. Truly enjoyable!

column7: friendly cosy and still with ambitions
column9: It is the perfect spot, always people there and the choice of drinks wine and beers is more than sufficient
Went last night for dinner, everything was perfect. Excellent service, great food & good wine! Beautiful restaurant, will be back!
